Texts.Eng: I believe you should be able to use these now, but you will need to crystallize them. I have crystallized them for you, but you can now do so yourself. Go build the Nova in an anvil and cause your own 'collapse'.

Your magical power is growing by the second, and it triggered a collapse that let me search through a long lost archive written by old magicians. Records indicate that a magical stone holds energy fueled by stars. I believe ^green;Wisper, Narfin, and Lumoth^reset; can produce these crystals upon death. There are also rumors of a ^green;shadowy puppy^reset; that eats them.^white;
